item.title: How to Care About Maine Coon
item.description: Always wanted a Maine Coon but don’t know where to begin? We’re here to help you! The Maine Coon is a large domesticated cat breed. It has a distinctive physical appearance and valuable hunting skills. It is one of the oldest natural breeds in North America, specifically native to the US state of Maine, where it is the official state cat. 1. FEED YOUR MAINE COON NUTRITIOUS FOOD Given a Maine Coon’s large body and active nature, it’s important to feed the feline sufficient nutritious food.

item.title: Quotes About Cats
item.description: Is your cat giving you that funny look again? Did you just watch them do something silly and then pretend it didn’t happen, like knocking over their pet bowl and just walking away? If so, we probably have a quote for that. Cats are such interesting creatures with unique personalities so we’ve rounded up the best funny cat quotes that best personifies your furry friend. “In ancient times cats were worshipped as gods; they have not forgotten this.

item.title: Cats Being Cats
item.description: Some funny cat videos to make your day better :)

item.title: Myths About Cats
item.description: 1. Black cats are unlucky Black cats have been the subject of myth and folklore for centuries, and while in some countries they are considered unlucky, the felines are said to bring good fortune in other parts of the world. In Japan, it is thought to be good luck if a black cat crosses your path, but in much of Europe and the US, the presence of a black cat is considered to mean that bad luck is on its way.
